1. Personal Background\
I am born in Taipei on February 2, 1999 and moved to Shanghai when I am five years old. I then stayed in Shanghai with my parents until I graduated from college in 2021.

2. Education\
I completed my undergraduate degree in July 2021 at Shanghai University of Finance and Economics, majoring in Finance. I also completed an exchange study for one semester in University of Pennsylvania in my junior year. I then pursued my masters degree at London Business School and is expected to graduate from LBS's Masters in Financial Analysis programmed in September 2022.

3. Business Experience\
I have developed a genuine interest in investment banking from my previous internship experiences. I have participated in a wide range of deals including an HK IPO, US IPO, A-share IPO, SPAC IPO, M&A and take-private transaction. Through these deal experiences, I have acquried strong financial modeling skills, communication skills, research skills and etc.

4. Interests\
My interests includes traveling, broad games, especially Avalon, and volunteering. I have traveled to more than 10 countries. My most memorable traveling experience is my trip to Paris where I was accommodated by a French homestay.
